raw: According to analytics firm Alpha Data , music streaming has declined in the past few weeks .

raw: In the period between March 13 through March 20 , streams across music streaming services like Spotify and Pandora pulled 9 % fewer streams than the week prior , with the drop - offs the highest in the pop , rap , R , and Latin Music genres .
replaced: In the period between March 13 through March 20 , streams across music streaming services like Spotify and Pandora pulled 9 % fewer streams than the week prior , with the drop - offs the highest in the pop , rap , R , and Latin Music genres .

raw: Interestingly , the classical , folk and children 's genres saw an increase in streams — likely as consumers gravitate towards more calming music or genres that appeal to their homebound children .
